NAME: Digital Taiwan Roundtable
BIO:
To enhance the competitiveness of Taiwan, we gathered people from the industry, government, universities, and research institutes to established the national “Digital Taiwan Roundtable” to bring together all the professionals and intelligence. We advocate the required adjustments of regulations and policies for digital transformation in industries and the society.  
Digital Taiwan Roundtable is a non-profit organization. Its mission is to promote the development of digital technology in various industries and to advice the government in formulating proactive policies, in order to enhance the international competitiveness advantages in digital technology related industries.
NAME-CH: 台灣數位科技與政策協進會
BIO-CH:
基於數位科技對於台灣競爭力之重要性，我們結合具共同理念與理想的產、官、學、研人士，成立全國性的「台灣數位科技與政策協進會」，期望藉此匯集專業與智慧，整合數位科技對各行各業發展所需的法規與政策，對政府建言並提供各界參考，以產生對數位科技產業進行結構性翻轉的效益。
本會為依法設立，非以營利為目的之社會團體，以促進各行各業結合數位科技發展，及建議政府制定前瞻性相關政策，促使數位科技相關產業具國際競爭優勢為宗旨。

NAME: Taiwan Network Information Center
BIO: The TWNIC operates ccTLD, IP allocation, DNS Security, and International Affairs under the supervision of the NCC and the organizational structure of TWNIC’s Board of Directors holds the decision-making power over the Center’s core policies. Also, there are four Committees responsible for drafting policy and providing information and recommendations; and five departments implement and carry out the Center’s missions.
NOTE:
7.11 更換TWNIC logo,原本logo下端有網址，對方希望能換
8.2 調整名字
NAME-CH: 財團法人台灣網路資訊中心
BIO-CH: 財團法人台灣網路資訊中心(Taiwan Network Information Center, TWNIC)是一家中立與非營利性的財團法人機構，負責頂級國碼網域名稱(country code top level domain name).tw及.台灣註冊管理、IP位址發放之維運。TWNIC除了提供全面的網路服務之外，也參加各種不同的相關國際會議，使台灣的網際網路社群與全球網際網路社群接軌，並與各種不同的社群合作，俾能藉由公開的參與以及持續的改進而促進網際網路的使用與應用。

NAME: Muyueh Inc.
BIO: We are Muyueh Lee and Ronny Wang. Together, we founded a company that provides award-winning data visualization services. Our clients include companies in the telecom and banking industries, and the WHO.
NAME-CH: 資料視覺化李慕約公司
BIO-CH:
資料視覺化幫助使用者看到資料。簡單的部份，是讓介面看起來漂亮。困難的部份，是讓介面有用。
企業組織內的決策者日理萬機。我們的服務幫助客戶找出問題，發展一個框架可以分析這一個問題，並用一個畫面的時間，把這問題解釋清楚，讓組織內的人可以一同採取行動。

李慕約與王向榮 (Ronny Wang) 是資料視覺化李慕約公司的創辦人。我們的服務獲得國際獎項肯定，客戶包含電信業、金融業、世界衛生組織。

NAME: Industrial Development Bureau, Ministry of Economic Affairs
BIO: The mission of the IDB is to promote industrial development in Taiwan, providing professional, innovative and comprehensive services efficiently and proactively that meet the needs of the industry, and facilitating industry upgrade and transformation. It works tirelessly to help Taiwanese companies enhance their productivity and competitive edge on the global stage, thereby better adapt to a rapidly changing world.
BIO-CH: 本局掌管全國工業發展任務，秉持專業、效率、主動、創新的服務精神（核心價值），以產業界需求為導向，提供產業全方位服務，致力於帶領台灣工業創新升級、轉型，積極輔導廠商強化經營體質，提高生產力及國際競爭力，並協助企業因應環境之變化。

NAME: Archilife Research Foundation
BIO: Since 1987, the Archilife Research Foundation started long-term researches in architecture, sustainability, and go on to other areas of knowledge integration. Efforts including previously giving scholarships in aforementioned areas, and currently holding reading group meetings and communion events for knowledge keepers to better our understandings of the world. Starting from 2011, we also have been sponsoring various open source related events, holding meetups and game jams for local game developers' community, and giving out scholarships to support indie game teams and encourage them to go to international game festivals.
NOTE: 這邊可以隨便筆記，不會顯示在網站上，如需編輯/加新欄位權限請私訊 @Lawrence Chou
BIO-CH: 祐生研究基金會由推動建築與環境永續發展之研究開始，推動長期的知識累積與人才培養。除了過去建築、環境、生態、健康與資訊社會與文化等面向之碩士論文獎助主題外，本會目前定期舉辦的聯誼會及讀書會，強化祐生成員的知識密度。 其後，於 2011 年起，本會持續針對國內開源活動進行贊助，也針對國內獨立遊戲開發者，推動知識與資訊分享聚會，並贊助台灣開發者前往特定國際遊戲競賽，期能幫助國內相關社群之發展。

NAME: Awoo
BIO:
With over 12 years of experiences in search marketing, awoo has been the leading SEO brand in Taiwan. To support our clients with rising customer acquisition cost, awoo started building its Marketing SaaS by leveraging artificial intelligence and our years of consulting experiences.
Today, awoo has provided consultation to over 600 corporate clients and accumulated more than 12,000 corporate users on our “awoo SEO Growth Hacking Tool”
BIO-CH:
awoo，台灣SEO領導品牌。深耕搜尋引擎行銷逾12年，近兩年以AI人工智慧，結合多年顧問經驗，打造行銷軟體(Marketing SaaS），協助企業解決新客戶取得成本高漲的問題。至今，awoo已累積600多間顧問客戶以及一萬二千間企業註冊「awoo SEO 成長駭客工具」
身為Google與HubSpot的台灣合作夥伴，awoo將以AI結合搜尋與社群行銷專家經驗，打造一個世界級的AI產品。

NAME: Netivism
BIO: NETivism (Internet for Activism) is a social enterprise focus on solving digital divide for Non-Profit Organization, via Open Source solution(Drupal & CiviCRM) and Love.
BIO-CH: 網絡行動科技（NETivism）自許為從數位公益出發的社會企業，八年來專注為非營利組織提供以自由軟體為基礎的資訊科技應用解決方案。 我們認為網路資訊科技能夠促成社會變革，影響文化、政治、環境等公共議題，帶來娛樂與商業行為之外的改變。目前提供 netiCRM.tw 支持者關係管理服務，協助 NPO 組織定期定額線上捐款、電子報行銷、活動報名等組織基礎需求的雲端系統，此系統原始碼亦為開放原始碼授權。

NAME: Civil IoT Taiwan
BIO: By the construction of “Air, Earthquake, Disaster, Water“ sensor networks and the use of open data through APIs, we hope to enhance civil service and disaster prevention ability in corporation with the industry. By building a data service platform which integrates data from the constructed “Air, Earthquake, Disaster, Water”sensor networks and provides functions of data aggregation, data visualization, and API connection, we are able to generate high-quality versatile streaming time series environmental data to be exploited by the industry and  accessed by the OGC’s SensorThings API standards. Our Goal is to bring the prosperity of big-data economy, and export the total solution of innovative data service and application overseas. Achievement of citizen happiness benefit from our program is our top priority.
BIO-CH: 為提供我國民生公共物聯網相關服務，前瞻基礎建設 –「建構民生公共物聯網計畫」致力於整合我國空氣品質、地震、防救災、水資源等民生四大領域環境監測資料，以期能強化政府智慧城鄉服務，提升全民生活幸福感。同時，將透過民生公共物聯網資料服務平台一站式入口，提供穩定、高品質的感測資料與運算資源，並開放給業界運用，促進國內資料產業經濟發展，並以國際輸出為目標，提供資料創新服務的整合方案。

NAME: Telecom Technology Center
BIO: Telecom Technology Center (TTC) is a non-profit organization authorized by National Communications Commission and has four main missions. First, TTC is a think tank of ICT policies for communications regulations and spectrum management, to develop a healthy communications industry environment. Second, TTC works as a think tank of ICT technologies to build a reliable environment for using digital convergent broadband internet. Third, TTC provides security evaluation, network performance, testing and certification services for ICT products and devices. Forth, as third party, TTC hosts Number Portability Administration Center and other related application platforms for telecom operators in order to promote tremendous growth of telecom market.
NAME-CH: 財團法人電信技術中心
BIO-CH: 財團法人電信技術中心(Telecom Technology Center, TTC)為國家通訊傳播委員會轄下非營利機構，主要任務為：擔任政策智庫，規劃通訊傳播政策及頻譜資源整備，以健全通訊傳播產業發展環境；擔任技術智庫，建構可靠的數位匯流寬頻網路使用環境；提供產業資通安全、網路效能及資通訊產品檢測驗證等技術服務；以公正第三者角色，提供電信業者號碼可攜資料庫管理及相關應用平臺服務，以促進產業蓬勃發展。

NAME: MediaTek Foundation
BIO: Recognizing that technological talents are the cornerstone on which Taiwan’s competitiveness is built, the “MediaTek Foundation” was founded in December 2001. Through the Foundation, MediaTek is able to turn the Company’s innovative R&D strength into momentum for technology education and industry development within Taiwan.
BIO-CH: 有感於人才是台灣競爭力的基礎，「聯發科技教育基金會」於 2001 年12 月成立。透過基金會，聯發科技將企業的創新研發能量，轉化為與台灣科技教育以及產業發展共同前進的力量。基金會的價值主張是「以知識驅動更好的未來」，透過四個行動主軸「科技扎根」、「人才培育」、「公益及社會參與」「社會創新」不斷深耕台灣 ，並且積極尋求政府、學界與民間的合作，以達到價值共創。十餘年來投入總額近新台幣 15 億元 ，在教育推廣、產業發展、社會人文等領域，與台灣共生共榮。

NAME: Security, Convenience, and Open Data.
BIO: Skymizer is proficient in compiling and virtual machine technology, which helps customers building efficient virtual machine for blockchain and compilers for hardware accelerators of deep learning. Our product “Skymizer C/C++ Intelligent Compiler” is powered by artificial intelligence and compiler techniques which improves both the efficiency and the quality of software automatically. It makes software engineers work smarter and easier.
BIO-CH: Skymizer 是頂尖的編譯與虛擬化技術團隊，幫助深度學習與數位貨幣應用的客戶建立各式的虛擬機器與編譯器，縮短 time-to-market 時間；產品為 C/C++ Intelligent Compiler，藉由獨到的編譯器與機器學習技術，幫助軟體團隊自動化的強化軟體品質、增加軟體效能。

NAME: CNEX
BIO:
CNEX = Chinese Next= See Next
We are a non-profit foundation devoted to the production and promotion of  documentaries of the Chinese people. CNEX strives to facilitate cultural exchange  between Chinese and the rest of the world through supporting documentaries  depicting contemporary Chinese – people of Chinese ethnicity, their living and their society.
BIO-CH:
CNEX 為一非營利性質的民間文創組織， 由兩岸三地熱愛紀錄片的人士組成
以開展文化資源、培育文化創意人才、促進華人社會和諧進步與華人文化的可持續性發展為願景，期望透過紀實文藝，促進國際社會與華人的文化交流。

NAME: Giloo
BIO: Giloo believes in the power of documentary and non-fiction storytelling. At the core of everything we do at Giloo, our goal is to drive the production, audience, circulation and promotion of great stories and experiments from partners and filmmakers around the world. We envision a platform where the curious will be able to connect with realities, one story at a time. Giloo is the international community where we reflect and contemplate on issues and affairs, provoke our own thinking, and learn from each other. Visit us at http://giloo.ist
BIO-CH: Giloo的命名，來自於閩南語「紀錄」的發音。 Giloo相信紀實影像與說故事的力量，如何從生產、觀看、流通與傳播等各個面向加大力道，是Giloo所有企劃與產品的核心提問。世界各地的導演們與製作團隊前進到遙遠的地方，挖掘了深刻的心靈，這些片子是他們努力的結果。Giloo相信紀實影像會影響各位，而正因為這些故事來自於世界，有了各位的觀看，世界也必將因此改變。

NAME: Homemakers Union Consumers Co-op
BIO:
Homemakers Union Consumers Co-op
To practice green consumption in daily life to maintain the sustainability of the earth.

A Group of Mothers Launched the Co-op for SAFE Food In 1993, more than one hundred families joined in buying rice and grapes directly from farmers, thus marked the beginning of our collective buying movement for safe and sustainable food. This initiative of green consumption was a project under the Homemakers United Foundation (HUF) as a way of inviting ordinary people to participate in the environmental movement through consolidating buying power.

We believe that making change starts with a bag of rice or a basket of vegetables. Besides shopping our daily needs in the Co-op, we are committed to build a better place for the future generations.
NAME-CH: 台灣主婦聯盟生活消費合作社
BIO-CH:
台灣主婦聯盟生活消費合作社
一包米、一籃菜，我們相信消費可以改變世界。從環境守護到共同購買，從消費力的集結到社會力的展現，我們透過「環保、健康、安全」的生活必需品，實踐綠色生活，支持地球永續！
願景──創造公義、健康、幸福、永續的社會。
宣言──我願意本著愛與合作的精神，主張綠色生活從安全的食物開始。透過共同購買的消費力量，保護台灣農業、捍衛糧食主權、支持友善環境的生產者及維繫地球資源的可持續性。
我們需要你／妳的加入！

NAME: KlickKlack
BIO-CH: KlickKlack Communications 提供專業的有線與無線網路服務，使人與人間的通訊落差降到最低。團隊已服務上百場活動，包含台灣地區最大的線上遊戲、網路直播、資訊社群、產品發表會、演唱會、會場展覽與電音派對等。整合網路監控、系統交叉備援、即時廣告互動，量身為客戶打造優質的網路服務體驗。

NAME: Watchout
BIO: We at Watchout believes that we can make Taiwan better. The power of making Taiwan better comes from active citizens who care and participate. This is why we are devoted to lower thresholds of political participation. We provide information and perspectives. We build platforms for speeches and dialogues. We make the People of Taiwan more powerful. We have named our company “Watchout” as a reminder that if we keep our eyes open, politicians will remember who they serve, and the civil society of our nation can grow deeper and stronger
BIO-CH: 我們相信台灣可以更好，而讓台灣更好的力量，來自於更多主動參與、向外關注的公民，所以，我們致力於降低公民參與政治的門檻，提供資訊、觀點，建造各式發聲、對話的平台，讓台灣人更有力量。沃草的英文名字 Watchout，原意是提防和警戒。只要我們每個小小公民都能時時張大眼睛、提高警覺，政客就不容易為所欲為，台灣的公民社會才能茁壯。
